GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.10.166
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_fs: Prevent race during ffs_ep0_queue_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit 6dd9ea05534f323668db94fcc2726c7a84547e78, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit ddf8abd2599491cbad959c700b90ba72a5dce8d0. For more details please see the references link.
